duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, evaluate, and improve manufacturing methods
Plan and implement cost-effective improvements in production procedures, workpiece fixturing, tooling, line layout, and automation
Train and develop operators to ensure the production of quality components to customer requirements
Perform engineering studies to determine the need for new, replacement, or modification of machinery or equipment
Communicate with machine manufacturers to resolve technical problems
Generate drawings for special fixtures or devices and for changes to electrical circuits
Assist in the development of a planned maintenance program
Observe and consult with other departments in areas of quality and safety
Create machine specifications for new equipment
Coordinate new equipment purchases, pre & final acceptance runoffs and assist in production start-ups
Approve any electrical changes to all production machinery
Maintain and provide a safe work area and work in a safe manner

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
